sentences.english: And the sound of the cherubims' wings was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of the Almighty God when he speaketh.
sentences.chinese: 基路伯翅膀的響聲聽到外院，好像全能神說話的聲音。

sentences.english: The servants had no choice but to live in daozuo in the front courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 傭人則只能住在外院的倒座房裏了。

sentences.english: I shall accept the arrangement of HuaQiao Foreign Languages Institute of Jilin Province regarding my study.
sentences.chinese: 接受華橋外院關於留學生學習方面的各項安排。

sentences.english: Moreover, the tool was used by experienced reviewers from outside the hospitals, Classen said.
sentences.chinese: 而且，該工具是由經驗豐富的外院審評專家使用。

sentences.english: And the gate of the outward court that looked toward the north, he measured the length thereof, and the breadth thereof.
sentences.chinese: 他量外院朝北的門，長寬若干。

sentences.english: He is a doctor sent by another school to study in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他是外院派到我們醫院學習的醫生。

sentences.english: Order wild goose and permit the base-court send to the everyone house to the thing for sending in the Shao house in go.
sentences.chinese: 吩咐雁容去外院把邵家送的東西送到各人屋裏去。

sentences.english: The moon gate divided the whole courtyard into inner and outer portions.
sentences.chinese: 月亮門把整個院落分成了裏院和外院。

definition: central building (in a traditional house)/primary wife
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
warm room/warm partition of a room
Neimen township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
